import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form,Modal,Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { connect } from "react-redux" import {clientDepositMpesa} from '../../pages/redux/Action' import SimpleReactValidator from 'simple-react-validator'; class Deposit extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { amount: '', payment_option:'', acc_no:'', email:'', phone:'', show:false } this.validator = new SimpleReactValidator() } changeHandler = event => { //event.preventDefault() this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } onSubmit=(event)=> { event.preventDefault() this.props.clientDepositMpesa(this.state.phone,this.state.amount) this.setState({show:true}) } render() { const PaymentSwitch=()=>{ switch(this.state.payment_option){ case 'M-PESA': return( ) case 'paypal': return( ) default: return( ) } } return (

this.validator.showMessageFor('amount')} onChange={this.changeHandler} /> {this.validator.message('amount', this.state.amount, 'required|numeric|min:0')} {/* */} {/* {this.state.payment_option ? PaymentSwitch(): null} */} {this.validator.allValid() ? : }
) } } const mapDispatchToProps={ clientDepositMpesa } export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(Deposit)
